name: NPC Coin
description: The NPC platform will be a decentralized video & streaming platform geared towards allowing creators to freely post/stream content of their choice without fear of being censored (or banned). Creators have the ability to upload content that will be featured on the platform that includes anything they wish except; violence, full nude content, illegal activities, and anything else YouTube/Twitch wouldnâ€™t allow. Main exception is speech, where creators can publicly voice their opinions without the fear of being censored or banned.
